metadata.name: 01_Pilgrims
metadata.description:
These portraits represent people from lower classes of society, despite all contemporary world issues, They go city of Mashhad to visit Imam Reza Shrine (the eighth Imam of the Shias) from different parts of the country.
They usually live in cheap inns or motels. When you encounter them, you are introduced to a new kind of culture, religion and everyday life that is very different from the luxury and modern world propositions of life and forgatten in our daily life.
Pilgrimage has always been important to me as part of the Iranian historical tradition and These photos try to show an image of ordinary people, the culture of pilgrimage and its historical tradition.

Khashayar Sharifaee 
2017-2018
